title: Be:Wi WatchFace
summary: High-contrast watch face with weather, agenda and battery display
description: Be:Wi is a digital watch face for Android Wear designed to be simple while being rich in information, highly readable and with good autonomy.This watch face displays:- the date- the watch battery level- the weather (tapping on it display more forecasts, the location is determined automatically)- events for the next 24 hours (tapping on it launch the system planning application)Note for Android 6 and above:To display weather forecasts, the app need to be manually granted the Location permission. This can be done through the phone Settings app -> Applications -> Be:Wi -> Permissions.
descriptionHTML:
Be:Wi is a digital watch face for Android Wear designed to be simple while being rich in information, highly readable and with good autonomy.

This watch face displays:
- the date
- the watch battery level
- the weather (tapping on it display more forecasts, the location is determined automatically)
- events for the next 24 hours (tapping on it launch the system planning application)

Note for Android 6 and above:
To display weather forecasts, the app need to be manually granted the Location permission. This can be done through the phone Settings app -> Applications -> Be:Wi -> Permissions.
